getMoveGuard() - Method in class dkeep.logic.Guard
Gets the move that the guard is supposed to do by using the variable iterator to check the move char in predefined move set array, and updates the iterator accordingly so that the next move set is ready to be check

Guard - Class in dkeep.logic
 
Guard(int, int, char) - Constructor for class dkeep.logic.Guard
Constructor of a guard type by setting its initial position and the element that represents it in the matrix a guard is defined by its predefined move set wich is stored in moveLevel1 variable, so the constructor puts the variable iterator at 0, variable that represents the current move type of the guard in the array of char
